weapon_description: A longbow that burns like a flame. The feathers that adorn it are said to have come from the ancient tyrant Ngoubou.
weapon_skill_description: Decreases Gliding Stamina consumption by 15%. When using Aimed Shots, the DMG dealt by Charged Attacks increases by 12% every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times and will be removed 10s after leaving Aiming Mode.
